messageBody:
Hi,
I need to mock the Connection object of the java.sql package. For this I used the com.mockobjects.sql.Connection2 mockobject.
Now the problem is , i have to make the rollback method of the mocked connection to throw an exception. Is there any way I can do that.I dont have the source code for com.mockobjects.sql.Connection2

ThankYou
Mona
